item.title: A River Runs Through It
item.description:
April 29, 2014 Atlanta, GA

Georgia Tech is renowned for transforming real-world challenges into teachable moments. Such was the case with the planning for the Engineered Biosystems Building (EBB) â€“ a project that in turn led to the development of the 2013 Stormwater Master Plan.
